case.title: Friends and more... - 28 (BK/NYC)
case.text:
If you're an intelligent, single, attractive, and physically fit man who is between the ages of 27-37 and 6'0 or over (is that too many requirements?), please send a pic and a bit about yourself and this very well-educated, attractive, and slim SBF will do the same in turn.
I'm new to the area and looking to meet great people and hopefully develop something more, so be respectful, but don't be shy ;)
